title: Hextech repair tool not working properly
body: So since yesterday every game I play my client freezes during champion select and I get dodged out. I have lost probably around 30 lp and a promo series because of this and after looking around for solutions I saw the hextech repair tool and figured I might try that since everything else seemed to not work. I installed it and did a regular client repair and went back into league and I was dodged out of champ select. I went back into the repair tool and tried to repatch it. It went through the scans and everything and the bottom said "Gathering logs.." and then the repair tool just closes. If I re open it and try again the same thing happens. League is completely unplayable for me right now and I would really like to repatch the client but even that isn't working properly.

replies.body: It sounds like there could be something blocking the repair tool from running. Just to be safe, I'd like to have you reinstall the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and then run it from the install directory as admin. Doing that should make sure that it did install correctly, and that it has the ability to run without being denied permission by your OS.

I actually did that myself just now, and the repair kit is still crashing.
Yeah, this happening to me too. Gonna try a fresh install.

I reinstalled the hextech repair tool but there is no option for me to run it as administrator from the installation directory. If I right click the shortcut it gives me the option under properties and compatibility to run as administrator in which case the same result as before happens where it just completely closes out after "Gathering Logs..." but if I go to the installation directory and go to the same properties > compatibility the option for me to run it as administrator is turned off.
After this I tried to do a clean uninstall with the repatching and it got past Gathering Logs and it completed so I looked in the logs and it said "Downloading installer - failed"

It sounds like the Repair Tool tried to repatch the client but it wasn't able to finish. If your Repair Tool can't finish repatching, and your client keeps freezing at champ select, it could be caused by an unstable connection to our game servers. 

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). The steps there should get you set up with a more stable connection!

I've tried initializing a full repair from client, a fresh reinstall, and the hextech tool. In all cases I had zero packet loss when checking my ping. The hextech tool crashes when trying to get system logs regardless of me giving it admin privileges or not.  Problem still not solved. Started since this patch. Have a support ticket open.

Late response, but the answer for me was disabling the discord overlay. I never asked for it but it's on by default. It took a little while before it affected my friends in the same manner but when I told them to disable the overlay in discord settings they found it was a good solution.

Basically the game was working 100% but nobody documented the error I was facing.

I had the same problem.  I uninstalled the repair tool and reinstalled it like the RIOT Admin recommended.  I then ran the repair tool as admin.  I got the same error.  I then deselected all the options that it allowed me to deselect.  Which  left "Run Ping Test" and "Sync System Clock" selected, only cause they are grayed out for deselection.  I then selected "Reinstall" and "Clean Uninstall",  then ran the program, and it worked perfectly.  In hindsight, you don't have to reinstall the Hextech Repair Tool, or run it as admin.  Just deselect everything it allows you to, and select "Reinstall" and "Clean Uninstall" .  I know this post is 6 months old, and this is my first post ever on the boards in 7 years.  I am technical challenged, but I hope this helps someone out.

Whenever i try to reinstall it goes through the entire process but when it get to the install part it says," downloading installer.....failed". please help i haven't been able to play for a week because my client gets an error 004 when i try to patch and nothing is working.
